bibl.title: Editing a Papyrus.
bibl.note: Introduction: The Tools of the Trade. - Decipherment: To and Fro between the Eye and the Mind. - Restoration: The Search for Parallels [example: P. Gen. IV, 155 (= LDAB 117816)]. - Translation: When It All Makes Sense. - Commentary: The Details That Matter. - Illustrations: Unless I See, I Shall Not Believe. - Major Editions: Of Dwarves Standing on the Shoulders of Giants. - Textual Criticism: No Text Is Perfect.
bibl.seg: R.S. BAGNALL (Ed.), The Oxford Handbook of Papyrology (Oxford, 2009) pp. 197-215, 1 fig., 1 tabl.

Introduction: The Tools of the Trade. - Decipherment: To and Fro between the Eye and the Mind. - Restoration: The Search for Parallels [example: P. Gen.
